```{r setup, include=FALSE}

library(tidyverse)

```


```{r}
mydata <- read_csv('electability_newspaper_search.csv',
                   col_type = cols(Year = col_double(),
                                   News_Mentions = col_double())) %>%
  drop_na()

mydata %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = Year, y = News_Mentions)) + 
  geom_point() + 
  geom_line() +
  theme_bw() + 
  ylim(0, 850) + 
  labs(
    title = "Election-Year Articles with \"Electability\" and \"Electable\" References",
    subtitle = "From the New York Times, Washington Post, and Christian Science Monitor.",
    x = "Year",
    y = "Count",
    caption = "Note: search words are case insensitive."
    ) + 
  ggsave("newspaper_mentions.bmp", width = 7.5, height = 4.5)
```
